casebody.data:
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL QUALITY, Division of Waste Management
v.
TRK DEVELOPMENT, LLC No. 184P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 T. Hill Davis, III, Assistant Attorney General, For NC Department of Environmental Quality Division of Waste Management Andrew Thomas Cornelius, Attorney at Law, Concord, Austin Entwistle, III, Attorney at Law, For TRK Development, LLC

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th of June 2018 by Respondent in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Davis, J. recused
